page.title: 19Outdoor Games
page.content:
{Skipping}is a game with a skipping rope. A skipping rope is a rope with wooden handles. You have to turn the rope round your head and jump when it comes to your feet. We sing songs about skipping.
{50}up is a game where somebody has to count to 50 while the other people hide. When the person has counted to 50 they have to go and find the other people. If the person sees one of the other people they run to the post. If they get there first they say "50 up". If the other person gets there first he or she says "50 up" and frees all the other people.
When I play outdoors I play on my {bike.}A bike is a thing with pedals and it takes you places. It is hard work riding a bike.
